title: Cornmeal Pizza Dough Recipe
directions: In a medium bowl, mix all dry ingredients.
Make a well in the middle and add wet ingredients.
With a fork, throughly blend into dough.
On a floured surface, knead dough for eight minutes until dough is elastic.
On a floured surface, roll out dough into 12 inches round.
Grease pizza pan with evoo and sprinkle corn grits onto pan.
Transfer dough to prepared pan and prick with fork through out dough.
While hot add your favorite toppings (taco recipe to follow!)
Return to oven till cheese is melted and Serve!
ingredients: 1 tbsp sugar or honey shopping list
2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil shopping list
